name: Budacanta
description:
Seek Szilvia on a boundary-testing voyage of discovery across Europe.

A story starting with getting our adventurer through the airport...

Note: This game is currently under development. It will be released in parts as and when they are ready. Please let me know if you have any comments to make, as I will use feedback to improve the game.

Alianora La Canta's Comment: “This visual novel was prompted by someone being confused that someone with autism (me) would want to go halfway across Europe on holiday on my own. I hope this excerpt shows both the fun and challenges of doing so.”
